name: Global Game Jam 2021
description:
S4VE

It is the year 3030 again and humans are now very comfortable living their everyday lives with droids who now make up most of the population of the world. 

However, following an earthquake, several systems were fatally compromised. These include the electronic genome of several droids (which turned them into D4-BA, security droid threats) and most disastrously,  the integrity of the power station was also compromised. 

The D3-BA, a search protocol droid, assumes the responsibility of saving the energy station and thus the entire android nation. His task is to search for the missing power plant parts but his work is made difficult by the D4-DA lurking in the dark corners and the tickling timebomb of dwindling energy life.
